Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

This poll is very important to decide 
a host for the new site. Chatting with 
Rauq, he offered host the site.  

  o Great!!!! I like the idea 
  o Humm, perhaps a other host as Angelfire, yahoo or sort is better 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=1078308  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
